dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: As of this moment, anyone who frowns at me will be dishonorably discharged.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Oversleeping is not tolerated on my watch. Such tardiness in wartime is flat out asking to be killed.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Look at those slackers, getting ready to roam about looking for a place to eat… I suggest we stock rations on the bus.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: I haven’t had the luxury of proper sleep for a long time. I saw firsthand the devastation that awaited me after a moment of rest.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: I never quite expected to meet the man here—our wartime hero who had vanished as soon as the war was over…

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: A swarm of insects never knows retreat. They rush out without a hint of reservation, and their jaws gnaw even the dead.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: My old subordinates… They would charge ahead at a single gesture of my hand, advancing until nothing but empty husks remained in their wake. A stark contrast to what I have here.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: I am still unaccustomed to the blue sky, as well as the fact that I can freely breathe this air… and the absence of shouts and cries that would break the dawn.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: Receiving commands from someone with zero experience in combat was unfathomable to me. However… I’m learning here that every rule has its exceptions.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Perhaps a squad-wide roll call will knock some sense into them…

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Salutations. I shall do my utmost to serve.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Ready to sortie!

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: I’m counting on your command.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Do you need my advice?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Charging in.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: I spotted a vulnerability.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Tch!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Where do I go next?

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: There will be full-on roll call tonight.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Excellent command.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: I can’t expect every order to be flawless.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: You’re worse than pests.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: I must acknowledge that your leadership rivals mine.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: If only I had assumed total command…
